name: Reaper Blob
description:
Shoot at at foes to weaken them, then dash into them to absorb them. Gain experience, level up, and become an unstoppable slime god. There's an NPC somewhere who'll tell you why you're doing all this, but, let's be honest here, does it really matter?

Controls:

  • LEFT CLICK - attack
  • SPACE - dash
  • WASD/ARROWS - move
  • ESCAPE/TAB - stat menu and inventory
  • NUMBER KEYS/RIGHT CLICK - abilities (as you unlock them)

Stats:

  • STRENGTH: projectile power
  • DEXTERITY: dash power and post-kill invincibility duration
  • AGILITY: movement speed
  • INTELLIGENCE: experience gain
  • CONSTITUTION: maximum health

Assets from: Tabletop Audio, Tiny RPG - Forest, 20 Evolving Fantasy RPG Weapons, Forest Scene, 2D Pixel Item Asset Pack, Free Pixel Mob

(There are several tiles in the map that don't match with their surroundings. This is a bug and we're not quite sure how to fix it. It's just a visual bug, though, with no effect on gameplay, so aside from being a bit jarring to look at you should be able to safely ignore them.)
